sentences.en: CCC MAC protocol is used for wireless mesh networks, including channel assignment and medium access.
sentences.cn: CCCMAC协议用于无线MESH网络, 包括信道分配及介质访问.

sentences.en: For most analytical applications, 100 to 200 mesh beads are sufficient.
sentences.cn: 对于大多数分析工作来说, 100目至200目的颗粒已经足够.

sentences.en: Lay strips of 4mm ply over the mesh and nail these down with panel pins.
sentences.cn: 把4毫米厚的胶合板条铺在网子上，然后用镶板钉钉牢。

sentences.en: Our ways of looking at these problems don't mesh.
sentences.cn: 我们观察这些问题的方法并不一致.

sentences.en: Polygonal objects ( Mesh ) are 3 D objects that consist of polygons.
sentences.cn: 多边形物体 ( Mesh ) 是由多边形组成的3D物体.

sentences.en: The debris can be separated from the anthers with a colander of proper mesh size.
sentences.cn: 使用适当大小网眼的滤器可把碎片与花药分开.

sentences.en: The dogs continued to paw and claw frantically at the chain mesh.
sentences.cn: 那些狗继续用爪子疯狂地抓铁丝网。

sentences.en: The ferric acetylacetonate, phenyl betanaphthylamine , and lecithin are added through 40 - mesh screen.
sentences.cn: 将乙酰丙酮铁, 苯基B- 萘胺及磷脂通过40目筛加入.

sentences.en: The fresh flesh on the mesh refreshed the dog.
sentences.cn: 网格上的新鲜肉使狗恢复了体力。

sentences.en: The ground-floor windows are obscured by wire mesh.
sentences.cn: 一楼的窗户装有防盗网。

sentences.en: The windows were covered in wire mesh to keep out flies.
sentences.cn: 窗户上装了铁丝纱网，防止苍蝇飞入。
他们的性格就是合不来.

sentences.en: This is the net having half inch mesh.
sentences.cn: 这是有半英寸网眼的网.

sentences.en: This net has a fine mesh.
wire mesh over the door of the cage
sentences.cn: 罩在笼子门上的铁丝网

words.tran_cn: 编织；以网捕捉（mesh的过去式及过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 筛孔尺寸；网格大小；目径

trans.tran_cn: 网孔，网眼，网状物，陷阱，困境，[机]（齿轮的）啮合
trans.tran_en: material made from threads or wires that have been woven together like a net, or a piece of this material
if two ideas or things mesh, they fit together very well

trans.tran_cn: （使）吻合，相配，匹配，用网捕，使缠住，紧密配合
